title: FLO and EDDIE / Turtles compilation (1965-76)
description:
With Mark Volman and Howard Kaylan (primary TURTLES members) it's about vocal

harmony.  According to rock lore they signed some "lousy deal" losing not only the 

rights to the TURTLES name but to their own names as well. 

Appropriating the names of 2 roadies they then became known as The Phlorescent Leech

and Eddie so that others could communicate with them and not risk a law suit.


After working with Zappa on the CHUNGA'S REVENGE LP and the movie 200 MOTELS

they were never quite the same musically and perhaps otherwise.  


This upload consists of vinyl rips from several FLO and EDDIE albums and CD rips of

TURTLES hits interspersed.  IT'S MUSICAL COMEDY but the music stands alone as 

good IMO.


There is some potentially offensive material here....Sue me only if you must.  Tell

my lawyer to drop dead and THEN bill me.
